decision_conditions: The ornamental trees as indicated on the drawing 113A Proposed Landscape Plan hereby approved, must be of standard 8-10cm girth as per BS:8545 2014. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Conditions 4(CTMP/CEMP), 5 (Fire Safety Strategy), 6 (Waste and Recycling), 7(Cycle Parking), 11 (Landscaping scheme) & 12 (SuDS) of planning permission 23/00273/FUL (Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 21/04113/FUL (Erection of two storey detached dwelling house and associated parking) to allow amendment to the roof and addition of a dormer window and rooflight)
